descr: "A provider issued list of services and products provided, or to be provided, to a patient which is provided to an insurer for payment recovery."

fields.name: sequence
fields.descr: "A service line number."

fields.name: careTeamLinkId
fields.descr: "CareTeam applicable for this service or product line."

fields.name: diagnosisLinkId
fields.descr: "Diagnosis applicable for this service or product line."

fields.name: procedureLinkId
fields.descr: "Procedures applicable for this service or product line."

fields.name: informationLinkId
fields.descr: "Exceptions, special conditions and supporting information pplicable for this service or product line."

fields.name: revenue
fields.descr: "The type of reveneu or cost center providing the product and/or service."

fields.name: category
fields.descr: "Health Care Service Type Codes  to identify the classification of service or benefits."

fields.name: service
fields.descr: "If this is an actual service or product line, ie. not a Group, then use code to indicate the Professional Service or Product supplied (eg. CTP, HCPCS,USCLS,ICD10, NCPDP,DIN,RXNorm,ACHI,CCI). If a grouping item then use a group code to indicate the type of thing being grouped eg. 'glasses' or 'compound'."

fields.name: modifier
fields.descr: "Item typification or modifiers codes, eg for Oral whether the treatment is cosmetic or associated with TMJ, or for medical whether the treatment was outside the clinic or out of office hours."

fields.name: programCode
fields.descr: "For programs which require reason codes for the inclusion or covering of this billed item under the program or sub-program."

fields.name: servicedDate
fields.descr: "The date or dates when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed."

fields.name: servicedPeriod
fields.descr: "The date or dates when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed."

fields.name: locationCodeableConcept
fields.descr: "Where the service was provided."

fields.name: locationAddress
fields.descr: "Where the service was provided."

fields.name: locationReference
fields.descr: "Where the service was provided."

fields.name: quantity
fields.descr: "The number of repetitions of a service or product."

fields.name: unitPrice
fields.descr: "If the item is a node then this is the fee for the product or service, otherwise this is the total of the fees for the children of the group."

fields.name: factor
fields.descr: "A real number that represents a multiplier used in determining the overall value of services delivered and/or goods received. The concept of a Factor allows for a discount or surcharge multiplier to be applied to a monetary amount."

fields.name: net
fields.descr: "The quantity times the unit price for an addittional service or product or charge. For example, the formula: unit Quantity * unit Price (Cost per Point) * factor Number  * points = net Amount. Quantity, factor and points are assumed to be 1 if not supplied."

fields.name: udi
fields.descr: "List of Unique Device Identifiers associated with this line item."

fields.name: bodySite
fields.descr: "Physical service site on the patient (limb, tooth, etc)."

fields.name: subSite
fields.descr: "A region or surface of the site, eg. limb region or tooth surface(s)."

fields.name: encounter
fields.descr: "A billed item may include goods or services provided in multiple encounters."

fields.name: detail
fields.descr: "Second tier of goods and services."

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: id
fields.descr:
"unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces."
 derived from Element
 derived from BackboneElement

fields.name: extension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."
